column4: anyone notice this bug in Gnome Terminal, running mplayer will cause no input to be visible afterwards in the terminal
like from a terminal if you run mplayer
the name for mplayer ui is "gmplayer"
im just saying its a bug
you nned to suppy the output plus the input file if you want to use "mplayer"
like if i run mplayer video.mov
then after the video is done i cant enter any text into the same terminal
-o requires something like "xv" or "gl" >> the graphics driver to display the fike
just read ubuntu's launchpad for *confirmed* bugs :)
